casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Hiral M. PATEL Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 2, 2017

Robert J. Scheinblum ; senior assistant state's attorney, in support of the petition.

The state's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court motion, 174 Conn.App. 298, 166 A.3d 727 (2017), is dismissed.
